steps.step: Fill a quart-sized wide-mouth jar with orange peels.
Completely cover the orange peels with the vinegar.
Cover and let sit for 1-2 days.
Strain out the peels and compost them.
Fill spray bottle halfway with the orange-infused vinegar and fill the other half with water.
